item.title: Intro to react
item.description: React is a frontend javascript framework which allows us to decouple the logic and rederning of an element in DOM. Creating an React Element React.createElement('Element name', props, ...children) Mounting a React Elment After creating an element you will need a place to mount the element until then the element you created will not be present in HTML DOM. The element you will mount your react element to is called root.
